subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: As the Breeders’ Cup, a two-day showcase of horse racing, begins Saturday, the sport is still mired in credibility and image problems linked to drug violations.
snippet: As the Breeders’ Cup, a two-day showcase of horse racing, begins Saturday, the sport is still mired in credibility and image problems linked to drug violations.
